MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD2 and TD3 postcode areas of Lauder and Gordon. Our team have managed to remotely restore power to some customers however due to adverse weather conditions and the extent of the repairs required, we now expect all remaining supplies to be restored by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35am on Friday, 4th December 2020.
